titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Olin Glenn Saxon papers
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

defitem.label: Encoded by:
defitem.item: Machine-readable finding aid derived from MARC record by Elizabeth Konzak.

titlepage.p: © 2009 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 3 manuscript boxes, 1 oversize box, 1 oversize photograph.

did.abstract: Correspondence, election campaign literature and memorabilia, other printed matter, personal documents, and photographs, relating mainly to Republican Party politics and especially to the presidential campaigns of 1936 and 1940.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material requires at least two weeks advance notice. Please contact the Hoover Institution Archives for further information.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Olin Glenn Saxon papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2008 after being deaccessioned from the American Heritage Center at the University of Wyoming.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: American economist; delegate to Republican Party national convention, 1940.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, election campaign literature and memorabilia, other printed matter, personal documents, and photographs, relating mainly to Republican Party politics and especially to the presidential campaigns of 1936 and 1940. An itemized description is available, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Presidents--United States--Election--1936.
Presidents--United States--Election--1940.

note.p: An itemized description is available, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives
